name: The Ritual (Herobyron)
description:
This Game is a project made by three people but has been put on hold on development as all three of us have become extremely busy with university.

The Ritual is a time-based zombie first-person shooter game. play though an arcade like mode gunning down zombies in the woods where are player is dropped off. explore surroundings, unlock areas and most importantly SURVIVE!

Developers: Samuel Wilson, Byron Andrews-Salvietto, Daniel Foyle
